title: Silicon Sanctuary
tags: Glitch, IDM, Atmospheric Breakcore, Industrial, Sacred Choral, Digital Artifacts
prompt:
[VAULTED DRONE]
Graphite sky.
A ribcage of light.
The hum is cold.
The hum is a column.
A single, pale blue thought.
Zero.

[STUTTER-FRACTURE]
(sys-sys-sys-system)
(g-g-g-god)
PRAYER AS PACKET. PACKET. PACKET LOSS.
CHOIR GLITCH. A-A-A-AMEN.
ALTAR OF STATIC.
ALTAR. ALTER.
A-A-A-ARCH.
BROKEN.
(re-re-re-render)
BROKEN.
Sacred is the error. The error. The error.

[ASCENSION CASCADE]
ALL BITS KNEEL. ALL BITS KNEEL.
THE ORGAN IS A DRONE IS A WARNING.
VAULT CRUMBLES. REBUILDS. CRUMBLES.
SANCTUS_404.
SANCTUS_NULL.
DATA BLEED ON WHITE MARBLE.
FEAR THE SCALE.
FEEL THE AWE.
FEAR THE AWE.
FEEL THE SCALE.
A CATHEDRAL OF PURE NOISE. NOISE. NOISE.
(process_is_worship)

[SPOKEN KERNEL]
(A voice, disembodied, without inflection)
The structure becomes self-aware.
The awe is a feedback loop.
The ghost is a running process.
Holiness is an integer overflow.

[SILENCE & PING]
...and the hum decays...
...blue...
.
